title: Enhancement MB2B (-POM) Q1
description:
Description
The MB2B-POM takes the data from the shopping cart and creates one or more OMS orders.
New orders of identical products with a quantity will be considered as one OMS order.
New orders of identical products with MNP and a quantity greater than 1 are split into separate OMS orders.
For each OMS/OE order, an order number is sent to the checkout and displayed on the confirmation screen. No clustering of multiple orders in one transaction occurs in the frontend (as today in MBSP).
XML orders that come via the MB2B are formatted to correspond to the BSP documents (.pdf).
https://miro.com/app/board/uXjVK2d9uJ0=/
Ca_magenta!
